name: The Greatest Generation Memory Card Game
name_original: The Greatest Generation Memory Card Game
description:
Match 2 silly Star Trek cards!   CAN YOU MATCH THEM ALL!? 

You can also play this on the web here:  http://jp00p.com/matchy

FEATUREZ 

  • Choice of two game modes
  • New game button
  • Lots of random cards each time you play

This is a very rudimentary game in my quest to learn Godot.  The cards are funny, and you'll probably enjoy this if you are a fan of the shows or the podcast The Greatest Generation.

Cards are from https://greatestgen.fandom.com/wiki/Greatest_Generation_Podcast_Wiki
